channel.title: Hint text message issue
channel.description:
Hey guys!
When loading the game up, some of the hint texts may show incorrect information. For example, in the attached screenshot, it says the the Glock's alternate fire is done by "right clicking". My alternate fire is the space bar; right clicking causes Gordon to jump. Since the player is able to change the key bindings for stuff like this, I recommend just removing the text which tells the player which button to press.
The player is introduced to "alt-firing" anyway so that will let the player know that's an option and to do some investigation into the keybinding. :slight_smile: ![2015-05-09_00001.jpg|690x500](upload://fJkLYFrmsWIwdjwRXgjjWEDk4SX.jpeg)
